messages.subject: Re: Need help adding my link
messages.msgSnippet: Crystal, Daikini Crossroads has been added! I would have sworn I d already added it, but noooop. I love your blog and can t believe I missed it. If anyone else
messages.messageBody:
Crystal,

Daikini Crossroads has been added! I would have sworn I'd already
added it, but noooop. I love your blog and can't believe I missed it.

If anyone else has an unschooling blog they'd like added, please email
me or post a link so I can put in in the links section.

Thanks!
Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Re: Need help adding my link
messages.msgSnippet: That should read... and add your blog . L-)
messages.messageBody:
That should read..."and add your blog". L-)

messages.subject: Need help adding my link
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Kristin...here s our blog. http://daikinicrossroads.blogspot.com/ I tried to add it to the blog links but I could not find the add button. Where???
messages.messageBody:
Hey Kristin...here's our blog.
http://daikinicrossroads.blogspot.com/

I tried to add it to the 'blog links' but I could not find the 'add' button.
Where???
~Crystal~
